title: Introducing: Maryann Vasquez
content:
LA’s Maryann Vasquez is getting better and better with every track she releases.

With a debut EP titled Due out 20 October, she’s dropped Turn You Down on her Soundcloud, a straight up 90’s inspired R&B jam. Alongside Turn You Down, her Soundcloud also features a rather fantastic take on Ellie Goulding’s Burn, and two other originals, Priscilla’s Song, and her year old debut track, Where The Wind Blows. Check out a selection of her tracks below, and keep your ears peeled for Due, out in a few days.
author: 5e9b68b27a1236eccfeb1d27
